what_you_do: Judy Weintraub is the founder of SkillBites, providing book writing and publishing services to help business owners and professionals get their books written and published easily and quickly.
who_you_serve: Entrepreneurs, professionals, lawyers, CEOs, and business owners who want to write and publish a book.
social_proof: Bestselling author of 'The Essentials of Negotiating Effectively' and 'How to Build Successful Business Partnerships'; has worked with hundreds of authors including lawyers, CEOs, and business owners.
signature_programs: The Essentials of Negotiating Effectively (book), How to Build Successful Business Partnerships (book), Write Publish and Prosper From A Business Book (program)
business_focus: Helping business owners and professionals write and publish books to establish authority and grow their businesses.
service_provided: ghostwriting, editing, book publishing, dispute resolution, business law services
